long_description: The REI Reset backpack easily holds all your daily essentials for work, school, the gym and anywhere in between so you can walk out the door ready for whatever the day might bring. Front zip pocket features an organizer so you can keep pencils, pens, lip balm, cash, keys and other small items separated and easy to access. Exterior zipper pocket keeps essential items close at hand so you don't have to waste time rummaging through your bag. Side mesh pockets create convenient storage and on-the-go access to a water bottle, sunscreen, snacks or small electronics. Fully adjustable, padded shoulder straps use soft edges for increased carrying comfort; strap keepers on the shoulder straps help keep webbing tails out of the way. Interior clip provides a secure, reliable home for your keys. The REI Reset backpack features reflective trim for improved visibility in low light.
short_description: The REI Reset backpack easily holds all your daily essentials for work, school, the gym and anywhere in between so you can walk out the door ready for whatever the day might bring.
